text:
@fordnation COVID-19 Pandemic stretches into the fourth month.

We see what BC, Yukon, & NWT allow them to use #CERB w/o clawback. 

You are the problem with the rest of Prov & Ter's greedy clawback. Vulnerable ODSP OW are already POOREST Canadians.

Premier Doug Ford greedy clawback $95M+ https://t.co/bjVlVhsQL7
